name: Raw Image
description:
Being a data operator is usually a dull job, but today something strange is happening. Binary data is coming through, but it's being corrupted.

Today is going to be one of those days. Swipe the columns & rows to rearrange the bits so that the image is correct.

You are shown what to aim for in the top & all the correct columns & rows are highlighted when correct.

Once you've done that, you can move on to the next. The quicker you do it, the better. You've got lots to do, so let's crack on.
